card_text: Roll a six-sided die, and if you roll a 1 or 6, add 1 card from your Deck to your hand that requires a die roll. If you roll a number other than 1 or 6, roll it again, and apply the appropriate effect.$N●1 or 6: Return this card to the hand.$N●2, 3, 4, or 5: Place this card on top of the Deck.$NYou can only activate 1 "Diced Dice" per turn.
